Key Match Events: David Warner scored a 36-ball 70 in the first innings, ensuring Australia's victory in the high-scoring contest
Post-Match Reflections: David Warner announced his intention to retire from international cricket after the T20 World Cup 2024
Miscellaneous Highlights: David Warner has already bid goodbye to ODI and Test cricket
Others: The T20 World Cup 2024 is set to take place in June in the Caribbean and USA
